Entries.default: Lagufaeth corpses litter the area. Some are burned beyond recognition, while others have been crushed so badly they're little more than a greasy smear on the ground.
A large group of lagufaeth are headed your way, their hulking broodmother in the lead. They don't seem to have noticed you yet.
You catch a flash of movement in your peripheral vision. You realize a large party of lagufaeth lie in wait for you in the surrounding jungle. No doubt they seek revenge for their fallen friends.
As you inspect the grisly scene, you catch a glimpse of a large group of lagufaeth lying in wait - and all of them have their blow darts trained on you.
The lagufaeth let out an ululating cry and charge toward you.
You turn to run only to find yourself facing a Lagufaeth warrior - its blow gun aimed directly at you. It fires the dart before you have a chance to respond, hitting you square in the chest.
As you inspect the grisly scene, you catch a glimpse of a large group of lagufaeth lying in wait - and all of them have their blow darts trained on you.
You creep back the way you came, avoiding the wilder's notice.
Before you can react, they fire a volley of darts. Though you do your best to dodge, one dart hits you square in the neck.
They fire a volley of darts before you have a chance to react. Though you dodge the projectiles, one dart hits [Specified 0] square in the neck.
You smell them before you see them.

You run, the leaves slapping you and vines catching up your legs.

Yet when you come to a stop, dripping sweat and swallowing great, heaving breaths, you see no sign of whatever killed the lagufaeth.

You turn to run only to find yourself facing a Lagufaeth warrior - its blow gun aimed directly at [SkillCheck 0]. It fires the dart before you have a chance to respond, hitting your companion square in the chest.
